metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Advanced ML System Design + Production Deployment
objectives: Master advanced ML system design patterns for production environments
Compare ML architectures across multiple FAANG companies
Address production concerns like security, privacy, and enterprise integration
Complete a capstone project building a comprehensive ML system architecture portfolio

morning_session.title: Advanced System Patterns & Multi-Modal
activities: Advanced ML system patterns with AI-enhanced production optimization
AI explanation of multi-modal ML systems and cross-platform integration
Performance optimization patterns with AI trade-off analysis and benchmarking

problems.name: Design a Feature Store
problems.ai_prompt: Design an ML Feature Store. Discuss how to handle feature versioning, online/offline access, and preventing data leakage between training and serving.

problems.name: Design an A/B Testing Framework
problems.ai_prompt: Design a framework for A/B testing ML models. How do you ensure statistical significance? Discuss metrics, experiment rollout, and result analysis.

problems.name: Design an ML Model Registry
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system for storing, versioning, and managing ML models. How does it integrate with CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment?

evening_session.title: Multi-Modal Search Design
activities: System Design: Multi-Modal Search System (text + image + video) with AI
ML System Study: Cross-company comparison of ML infrastructure patterns
Plan advanced production optimization with AI strategic guidance

morning_session.title: System Performance & Optimization
activities: ML system performance optimization with AI-guided profiling and tuning
AI explanation of hardware optimization for ML workloads (GPU, TPU, edge)
Real-time ML system constraints with AI latency and throughput optimization

problems.name: Design a Real-time ML Pipeline
problems.ai_prompt: Design a pipeline for real-time inference on streaming data. Compare technologies like Kafka, Flink, and Spark Streaming. Discuss state management.

problems.name: Design an ML Monitoring System
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system to monitor deployed ML models. What key metrics would you track? How would you detect concept drift and data drift?

problems.name: Design an Auto-scaling ML Service
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system that automatically scales ML inference services based on load. What metrics would trigger scaling events (e.g., QPS, CPU/GPU utilization, latency)?

evening_session.title: Real-time RecSys Design
activities: System Design: Real-time Recommendation Engine with AI latency optimization
Study hardware acceleration and edge deployment optimization techniques
Advanced SQL: Complex analytics for ML system performance monitoring

morning_session.title: System Security & Privacy
activities: ML system security with AI-guided threat modeling and protection strategies
AI explanation of privacy-preserving ML techniques and federated learning
Compliance and governance in ML systems with AI policy optimization

problems.name: Design a Secure ML API
problems.ai_prompt: How would you secure the API for an ML inference service? Discuss authentication, authorization, input validation, and preventing model inversion attacks.

problems.name: Design a Privacy-Preserving System
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system that collects user data for ML training while preserving privacy. Explain how you would apply differential privacy.

problems.name: Design a Federated Learning System
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system for federated learning on mobile devices. How does the central server aggregate model updates? Discuss challenges like communication efficiency and handling non-IID data.

evening_session.title: Healthcare ML System Design
activities: System Design: Healthcare ML System with privacy and compliance requirements
ML Study: Regulatory compliance in ML systems across different industries
Plan comprehensive system architecture with AI security optimization

morning_session.title: Enterprise ML Integration
activities: Enterprise ML system integration with AI-guided architecture patterns
AI explanation of ML system interoperability and API design
Legacy system integration with AI migration and modernization strategies

problems.name: Design an Enterprise ML Platform
problems.ai_prompt: Design a multi-tenant ML platform for a large enterprise. How do you handle resource isolation, security, and shared infrastructure (like feature stores)?

problems.name: Design an ML Data Lake
problems.description: Scalable data management with AI optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Design a data lake for ML. Discuss data ingestion, storage formats (e.g., Parquet, Avro), data cataloging, and governance.

problems.name: Design an ML Governance System
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system for ML governance. How would you track model lineage, manage access control, and generate audit trails for regulatory compliance?

evening_session.title: Enterprise Mock & Final Prep
activities: AI Mock Interview: Enterprise ML system design with multiple stakeholders
Study enterprise ML adoption patterns and organizational change management
Plan Phase 3 completion assessment with AI comprehensive evaluation

morning_session.title: System Mastery & Advanced Patterns
activities: Advanced ML architecture patterns with AI optimization for different domains
AI explanation of ML system evolution and future architecture trends
Competition-level system design with AI strategic optimization

problems.name: Design a Global ML Platform
problems.ai_prompt: Design an ML platform deployed across multiple geographic regions. Discuss data locality, multi-region model serving, and disaster recovery.

problems.name: Design an AutoML System
problems.ai_prompt: Design an AutoML system that automates feature engineering, model selection, and hyperparameter tuning. Discuss the search algorithms you might use.

evening_session.title: Design Contest & Analysis
activities: Advanced System Design Competition with AI coaching
AI analysis of advanced system design capabilities and optimization
Phase 3 comprehensive assessment preparation with AI evaluation

saturday.title: Portfolio Project: Multi-Modal AI System Architecture
saturday.description: Design and implement a sophisticated multi-modal AI system that processes text, images, and audio simultaneously using advanced algorithms. The system will demonstrate integration of multiple AI techniques with efficient data structure management.

problems.name: Cherry Pickup
problems.description: 3D DP for optimal path finding with constraints

problems.name: Minimum Difficulty of a Job Schedule

tasks: Design multi-modal data ingestion pipelines using efficient data structures for text, image, and audio.
Implement cross-modal attention mechanisms using advanced tree and graph algorithms.
Create real-time feature fusion system using heaps and priority queues for latency optimization.
Build scalable inference serving architecture using advanced caching and load balancing algorithms.
saturday.deliverable: A deployed multi-modal AI system with web interface, real-time processing capabilities, and comprehensive performance analysis.

sunday.title: Comprehensive AI System Study & Phase 3 Preparation
sunday.description: Conduct comprehensive analysis of cutting-edge AI systems across major tech companies, synthesizing learnings from all previous weeks to prepare for advanced system design challenges in Phase 3.

problems.name: Strange Printer
problems.description: Interval DP for optimal sequence planning

tasks: Analyze and compare AI system architectures across Google, Meta, OpenAI, Tesla, and Microsoft.
Synthesize common design patterns and trade-offs in large-scale ML infrastructure.
Create comprehensive mapping of algorithms to real-world ML system components.
Develop strategic learning plan for Phase 3 focusing on system design mastery and ML infrastructure.
sunday.deliverable: Comprehensive AI systems analysis report with Phase 3 preparation strategy and personalized learning roadmap.
